title: Stripe taking sign-ups for ‘Tap to Pay on iPhone’ beta program ahead of spring release
content:
Apple turned the rumor of iPhones becoming mobile payment terminals into an official announcement today, and payment processor Stripe has more details.

more…

The post Stripe taking sign-ups for ‘Tap to Pay on iPhone’ beta program ahead of spring release appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple turned the rumor of iPhones becoming mobile payment terminals into an official announcement today, and payment processor Stripe has more details. For starters, Stripe suggests that Tap to Pay on iPhone will debut before summer: Turn an iPhone into a contactless reader using Tap to Pay on iPhone and the Stripe Terminal SDK. Accept […]
